With 2013 halfway done, how is the economy doing? Julia Coronado, chief North American economist BNP Paribas, joins Marketplace Morning Report host David Brancaccio to discuss.

title: Halfway through 2013, how's the economy doing?
teaser: With 2013 halfway done, how is the economy doing? Julia Coronado, chief North American economist BNP Paribas, shares her take.
contentencoded: With 2013 halfway done, how is the economy doing? Julia Coronado, chief North American economist BNP Paribas, joins Marketplace Morning Report host David Brancaccio to discuss.
itags: Marketplace Morning Report for Monday, July 1, 2013
description: With 2013 halfway done, how is the economy doing? Julia Coronado, chief North American economist BNP Paribas, shares her take.
